name: bunkerweb
description: BunkerWeb is a security-focused web server built on NGINX, with automatic security rules intelligently applied. It defends against common attacks and simplifies server hardening for self-hosters.
features: Security-Focused: NGINX-based web server with automatic security hardening. Protected by default.
Automatic Rules: Intelligent security rules applied automatically. No manual configuration.
Attack Defense: Protection against common web attacks and exploits. Stay secure.
Easy Hardening: Simplified server security for self-hosters. Security made simple.
NGINX Foundation: Built on proven, reliable NGINX technology. Production-ready.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your web server security. Your infrastructure.
